### Features Implemented
1. **Deep Link Navigation**: Notifications with relatedType/relatedId now link to the appropriate page
   - `sync_log` -> `/integrations`
   - `credential` -> `/integrations`
2. **Severity Styling**: Visual color coding for notification types
   - `sync_failure`: Red border/background
   - `alert`: Orange border/background
   - `warning`: Yellow border/background
   - `sync_success`: Green border/background
   - `info`: Blue border/background (default)
3. **Visual Enhancements**:
   - ExternalLink icon on linked notifications
   - Ring indicator for unread notifications
   - Reduced opacity for read notifications
